main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Columbia, South Carolina on June 26, 1952.
interesting points: Mr. E. K. Pinson reported observing a bright, disc-shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed,The object was estimated to be approximately fifty feet in diameter,The sighting lasted for about two minutes before the object disappeared from view,The investigator found consistent descriptions from multiple witnesses,No physical evidence or photographs were obtained during the investigation.
witness description: Mr. E. K. Pinson, a male civilian who reported the sighting while driving
